ModMetaData.name: [Pratt] Rimworld At War : Late XIXth early XXth Far West Weapons Pack (CE)
ModMetaData.author: Pratt
ModMetaData.description:
Rimworld At War : Late XIXth early XXth Far West Weapons Pack (CE).
Include : - Springfield Trap Door Model 1873 (.45-70 Government) - Remington Rolling-Block (.45-70 Government) - Henry Model 1860 (.44 Henry) - Winchester Model 1866 (.44 Henry) - Winchester Model 1873 (.44-40 WCF) - Double-barrel Shotgun (12 Gauge) - Sawed-off Double-barrel Shotgun (12 Gauge) - Winchester Model 1887 (12 Gauge) - Winchester Model 1897 (12 Gauge) - Browning A5 (12 Gauge) - Colt Single Action Army (.45 Colt) - Colt Single Action Army (.44-40 WCF) - SW Model 3 Scofield (.45 Scofield) - SW Model 3 Scofield (.44-40 WCF) - Colt New Army (.41 Long Colt) - Mauser C96 (7.63x25mm)
